title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.6 - Public notice of a granted variance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 803.6 - Public notice of a granted variance

State Regulations

Every order granting a variance shall be published in the

State Register and shall specify the alternative to the standard involved which
the variance permits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
803.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
